name: Physics For Dummies
description:
Main Controls

WASD to move character, Left and Right buttons to use the gun on related objects. Please check the How to Play section in the main menu for a more in-depth description.

Credits

Coding, Cinematic and Level Design - Ashveer Jugdav (https://ashcubed.itch.io)

Generalist - Simon Stockley (https://newagegamer.itch.io)
